mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WT_BOARD_POST(wtID, wtTitle, userID, wtDate, wtContent) VALUES(#{wtID}, #{wtTitle}, #{userID}, #{wtDate}, #{wtContent})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS currentDateTime FROM DUAL
SELECT * FROM WT_BOARD_POST WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY wtID DESC
SELECT * FROM WT_BOARD_POST WHERE wtTitle LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR userID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
SELECT * FROM WT_BOARD_POST WHERE wtID < #{wtID} ORDER BY wtID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM WT_BOARD_POST WHERE wtID > #{wtID} ORDER BY wtID ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
